summary: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.
cast: Shia LaBeouf|Sarah Roemer|Carrie-Anne Moss|David Morse|Aaron Yoo|Jose Pablo Cantillo|Matt Craven|Viola Davis|Brandon Caruso|Luciano Rauso|Daniel Caruso|Kevin Quinn|Elyse Mirto|Suzanne Rico|Kent Shocknek|Rene Rivera|Amanda Walsh|Charles Carroll|Gillian Shure|Dominic Daniel|Lisa Tobin|Cindy Lou Adkins|Kurt David Anderson|Suzanne LaChasse|Clayton Mattingly|Angela Storm|Larry Varanelli
title: Disturbia
